DOC.brief_summary: 200 consecutive patient present STEMI within 12 hour onset symptom high thrombotic burden coronary angiography , define presence thrombus size ≥ 2 time diameter vessel , accord visual estimate . The main objective study evaluate effectiveness thrombectomy ( either rheolytic manual aspiration ) adjunct primary rescue angioplasty , patient angiographic evidence high thrombotic burden culprit artery . Primary end point : ( 1 ) rate complete ST-segment elevation resolution 60 minute end procedure ; ( 2 ) infarct size assess delayed-enhancement cardiac magnetic resonance imaging ( DE-MRI ) 3 month index procedure . Secondary endpoint : post-procedural TIMI flow grade ; post-procedural MBG ; infarct transmurality 3 month ; MVO 3 month ; 1-year actuarial freedom MACEs .
